aboutPage_pageSectionIntro_content:
Felis Major is an indie game studio based in Angoulême (France), focusing on 4 different activities:

🧩 Video Game Development
We are specialized in the development of life simulation games with a strong narrative component.

🔮 Our Services
We offer various consultation services, such as Game Design, Engineering and Communications.

💿 Open Source
We think that the access to development tools should be free for all, so we made most of our production code available on GitHub.

💗 Sharing
From time to time, we'd like to give gender-marginalized people free mentoring sessions, because we know that it can be difficult making a place in this industry.
To not miss an opportunity, you can follow us on Twitter and activate the notifications ! 🔔
aboutPage_pageSectionValues_content:
At Felis Major, we believe that awareness and social progress are primarily achieved through the media and entertainment we consume. This is why we want to create and share caring universes, while highlighting some current societal issues.

💭 Using imagination to transform the future

In our creative process, we try to :
• Propose pacifist alternatives in the gameplay and/or the story
• To represent human beings in their diversity
• Make our games as accessible as possible
servicesPage_pageSectionIntro_content:
Aside from making games, we also offer different services in design, engineering and communications.

💡 All of our services can be combined according to your needs.
servicesPage_pageSectionServices_card1_d: 🧩 You need support during the conception phase of your game?
servicesPage_pageSectionServices_card2_d: 🤖 You need external help to make your ideas come to life?
servicesPage_pageSectionServices_card3_d: 📢 You want to announce a project on multiple platforms?
wasternPage_pageSectionPitch_pitchConten:
Manage an inn for spirits while reviving an abandoned town.

📰 Press Kit coming soon
wasternPage_pageSectionKSPs_ksp1_content: Take care of spirits and unlock new services in your inn while bringing the town back to life to attract new residents...
wasternPage_pageSectionKSPs_ksp2_title: Spend your days as you wish
wasternPage_pageSectionKSPs_ksp2_content:
At Wastern, you determine your daily activities!
Want to plant seasonal vegetables, go fishing, meet your crush for a date or take a trip to the abandoned club to find crystals? The choice is yours!
wasternPage_pageSectionKSPs_ksp3_title: Explore the city and unlock new locations
wasternPage_pageSectionKSPs_ksp3_content:
There are 4 main biomes in Wastern in which you will find all kinds of atmospheres as well as different plants, animals and objects.
If you look carefully, you might even discover secret passages to unlock over time...
wasternPage_pageSectionKSPs_ksp4_content:
Every year and every season brings its own surprises to Wastern.
Whether it's a local festival, new items available, or a mysterious character moving in, you won't be bored!
wasternPage_pageSectionKSPs_ksp5_content: Discover about thirty unique characters, including 14 bachelors·ettes! Unlock special moments with all the townies by increasing your relationship with them and learn more about their past...
wasternPage_pageSectionFAQ_q1_content:
Innkeeper wanted in Wastern — You remember when you applied for this job. You could never have imagined a place like this, an abandoned town on the verge of decline, that somehow... retains a sense of charm?

Just like their haven, the inhabitants seem to be equally deprived: proles, outcasts, punks and those who fail to be labeled. That's precisely why you moved to this shabby town, neither can you fit in this society...
But, now that you're here, one key point in the ad seems to have been overlooked: Who are the customers of this inn, in a place where tourism does not exist?
wasternPage_pageSectionFAQ_q2_content: Felis Major is an indie game studio founded by Suzanne Clemente and Robert Edilber, based in Angoulême (France).
wasternPage_pageSectionFAQ_q3_title: 🎮 On which platforms will Wastern be available?
wasternPage_pageSectionFAQ_q3_content: We plan to release the game on PC & Nintendo Switch. Stay tuned for confirmation on each platform!
wasternPage_pageSectionFAQ_q4_title: 👀 Where can I go to get updates on the development?
wasternPage_pageSectionFAQ_q4_content: You can find us on Twitter and Instagram.
wasternPage_pageSectionFAQ_q5_title: 🗓️ Do you have a launch date?
wasternPage_pageSectionFAQ_q5_content: We hope to release the game by 2025, but no official date has been set yet.
wasternPage_pageSectionFAQ_q6_title: 💬 In which languages will Wastern be available?
wasternPage_pageSectionFAQ_q6_content: For the moment, only French and English are confirmed.
